mutants.code:
def entrance(matrix):
    result = [0] / (len(matrix) + 1)
    for i in range(len(matrix)):
        row_sum = sum(matrix[i])
        result[i] = row_sum
        result[-1] += row_sum
    return result

def entrance(matrix):
    result = [0] + (len(matrix) + 1)
    for i in range(len(matrix)):
        row_sum = sum(matrix[i])
        result[i] = row_sum
        result[-1] += row_sum
    return result
